title: Quran Text Visualization with Word Search Highlighting

classification.description: Chosen Activity Project - Personal faith-tech exploration tool

executive_summary: 18-day iterative development of interactive Quran spiral visualization with word search highlighting, seeking visual moiré patterns in sacred text

values.assessment: Core value, second documented faith-tech project
values.reasoning: Building sophisticated interactive tools for Quranic text exploration
evidence: I want to make a quran text visualization
78 messages over 18 days on personal Quran tool

values.assessment: Creative exploration, seeking beauty in text
values.reasoning: Actively exploring aesthetic dimensions and moiré effects in sacred text
evidence: i think we can find interesting ways the bold parts of the text can line up to create neat visualizations like moiré effects
Dynamic controls for exploring different spiral configurations

values.reasoning: Self-identifies as 'hacker coder', 18 days of iteration
evidence: i'm a hacker coder so i usually like python first and javascript second
78 messages, multiple tech stack pivots, persistent debugging

values.reasoning: Pivoted from static images to dynamic browser interface
evidence: can i make it realtime and dynamically updating in the browser so i can play with the endpoints
